import MethodEndpoint from "@theme/ApiExplorer/MethodEndpoint";
import ParamsDetails from "@theme/ParamsDetails";
import RequestSchema from "@theme/RequestSchema";

import OperationTabs from "@theme/OperationTabs";

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Mark ticket as duplicate"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId}/mark-as-duplicate/{duplicateOfTicketId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Marks a ticket as a duplicate of another ticket so that work can be consolidated.

**Prerequisites**
1. **ticketId** – The ticket being marked duplicate. Obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) and read `Items[].TicketId`.
2. **duplicateOfTicketId** – The primary ticket that will remain open. Also obtain via [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) or from the ticket detail view `Item.TicketId`.

**Workflow Example**
1. Search for both tickets with [POST /api/v1.0/tickets](/docs/api/tickets/search-tickets) to get their UUIDs.
2. Choose the ticket to close (`ticketId`) and the primary ticket (`duplicateOfTicketId`).
3. Call [POST /api/v1.0/tickets/\{ticketId\}/mark-as-duplicate/\{duplicateOfTicketId\}](/docs/api/tickets/mark-ticket-as-duplicate) to link the records.

**Minimal Required Fields**: ticketId, duplicateOfTicketId

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"ticketId","in":"path","required":true,"description":"UUID of the ticket flagged as duplicate. Obtain via POST /api/v1.0/tickets or GET /api/v1.0/tickets/{ticketId} and read `Item.TicketId`.","example":"0566a7fd-6dab-ef11-88cf-6045bdb6b1c9","x-obtained-from":{"operationId":"searchTickets","endpoint":"POST /api/v1.0/tickets","responseField":"Items[].TicketId"},"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
